mapper.insert: insert into user(uid, blog_id, memo_id, provider, provider_id, create_date) values(#{uid}, #{blogId}, #{memoId}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, now());
insert into userinfo(uid, nickname, profile) values(#{uid}, #{nickname}, #{profile})
insert into blog(blog_id, blog_title, blog_like, blog_profile, blog_view) values(#{blogId}, #{blogTitle}, #{blogLike}, #{blogProfile}, #{blogView})
